Sergio Marchionne also reminded employees that it was with the assistance of the federal government of Ontario that Chrysler has been given an opportunity to create a future. Chrysler Group owes a deep debt of gratitude to taxpayers in Canada and the U.S. for the loans that enabled a reenergized, restructured company to emerge in June 2009, said Sergio Marchionne . believed the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman.
